altername_name: Quiz Nanairo Dreams - Nijiiro-chou no Kiseki
name: Quiz Nanairo Dreams: Nijiirochou no Kiseki
overview: Quiz Nanairo Dreams Nijiiro Maki No Kiseki is a conversion of the arcade machine Quiz Nanairo Dreams released by Capcom in 1996. A quiz game with traditional Capcom art. Your goal is to become friends with seven females in order to obtain the crystals within them which will be used to defeat the Devil King. In the night of 31th March when a boy is watching the stars when one of that starts transform into a fairy that tells him that he have to recover the 7 parts of the seal of Crystal that is sealing Satan (the Devil King), he only got 6 months before that happens. There are 7 girls that got that 7 parts of the Crystal so he got to answer questions to recover the crystal parts. The gameplay is a board game in which the player have to roll a roulette and depending of the number he will reach different squares, in some there are quiz made by the girls and in others there is a demon that make other questions.
